title: Halsey William Wilson
summary: Halsey William Wilson (May 12, 1868 – March 1, 1954) was the creator of the Readers' Guide, the Cumulative Book Index, and the Book Review Digest and founder of the H. W. Wilson Company, a publisher.   In 1999, American Libraries named him one of the "100 Most Important Leaders We Had in the 20th Century".
